dict.string: An Alfred workflow to help use OpenAI text-completion API.

require './openai.rb'
params = ARGV[0].split(/\s+/, 10)
mode = params[0] model = params[1] max_tokens = params[2] temperature = params[3] top_p = params[4] presence_penalty = params[5] frequency_penalty = params[6] timeout = params[7] echo = params[8] query = params[9]
IO.popen('pbcopy', 'w') { |f| f << query }
execute_query(apikey: ENV["apikey"], mode: mode, model: model, first_language: ENV["first_language"], second_language: ENV["second_language"], max_characters: ENV["max_characters"], max_tokens: max_tokens, temperature: temperature, top_p: top_p, frequency_penalty: frequency_penalty, presence_penalty: presence_penalty, timeout_sec: timeout, echo: echo )
Input a line to be prepended before selected text
Input a line to be appended after selected text

on run argv set theMessage to "Proceed with the following input and settings?
-------------------------------------------------
" & (the clipboard as text) & "
-------------------------------------------------
" & "Model: " & (system attribute "model") & " " & "Max Tokens: " & (system attribute "max_tokens") & " " & "Temperature: " & (system attribute "temperature") & " " & "Top P: " & (system attribute "top_p") & " " & "Frequency Penalty: " & (system attribute "frequency_penalty") & " " & "Presence Penalty: " & (system attribute "presence_penalty") & " " & "Timeout: " & (system attribute "timeout") & " " & "Echo: " & (system attribute "echo") set iconPath to (do shell script "pwd") & "/openai.icns" as string
display dialog theMessage with icon iconPath as POSIX file buttons {"Cancel", "Continue"} default button 2 if button returned of result = "Cancel" then return 0 else if button returned of result = "Continue" then return 1 end if end if
end run
on run argv tell application "Alfred 5" to activate tell application "System Events" to key code 53 end run

[{"imagefile":"67a30e2d930ac97137a5a084c2d95019de3f46e6.png","title":"Direct Query","arg":"direct","subtitle":"Ask anything"},{"imagefile":"684d480404425e3133fa299d5c8a91f9914323e1.png","title":"Prepend Text + Query","arg":"prepend","subtitle":"Prepend text before the original input before making a query"},{"imagefile":"b32a3ccdd5cbd444e40a7e1d87f3eb7c3ac4188c.png","title":"Append Text + Query","arg":"append","subtitle":"Append text after the original input before making a query"},{"imagefile":"319c68c97ab65598e9f3647f435c5e2fd438c103.png","title":"Write Program Code","arg":"write_program_code","subtitle":"Write program code in a language specified in the prompt"},{"imagefile":"0d3b751bd8d24cc7376239647844684930eab644.png","title":"Ask in {var:first_language}","arg":"question_in_your_language","subtitle":"Ask anything in the language set to \"first_language\""},{"imagefile":"115e5831bb490b07600422039edaba8f7d9ee677.png","title":"Translate {var:first_language} to {var:second_language}","arg":"translate_l1_to_l2","subtitle":"Translate your first language text to your second language text"},{"imagefile":"115e5831bb490b07600422039edaba8f7d9ee677.png","title":"Translate {var:second_language} to {var:first_language}","arg":"translate_l2_to_l1","subtitle":"Translate your second language text to your first language text"},{"imagefile":"17118fd42653d1100aaeacbd3c3a3c0806c259f8.png","title":"Grammar Correction","arg":"grammar_correction","subtitle":"Corrects sentences into standard English"},{"imagefile":"e06539affd12ee71babb603696ea4c22bff9899f.png","title":"Brainstorm","arg":"brainstorm","subtitle":"Brainstorm some ideas about X"},{"imagefile":"44ccdabf23ba7c40eb3d173810461ca008839431.png","title":"Create Study Notes","arg":"create_study_notes","subtitle":"Provide a topic and get study notes"},{"imagefile":"3c40206ef57703a51f6bf18854168a8a3870fcde.png","title":"Analogy Maker","arg":"analogy_maker","subtitle":"Create analogies. Modified from a community prompt to require fewer examples"},{"imagefile":"af171358f7cbe2705732f127d620bc3796470300.png","title":"Essay Outline","arg":"essay_outline","subtitle":"Generate an outline for a research topic"},{"imagefile":"ebb7d734dcf19dfcac20e176e8d5e70421d5dae2.png","title":"TL;DR Summarization","arg":"summarization","subtitle":"Summarize the text"},{"imagefile":"642ed6abc35265ed94cfba5464ad0cd2e4d8bc3a.png","title":"Summarize for a 2nd Grader","arg":"summarize_for_a_2nd_grader","subtitle":"Translates difficult text into simpler concepts"},{"imagefile":"01d92ab847dd569dcc35398189b0ffaf35f68d5d.png","title":"Keywords","arg":"keywords","subtitle":"Extract keywords from a block of text"}]
Items can be narrowed down by entering text

meta="---\n\ title: OpenAI Text-Completion Alfred Workflow\n\ header-includes: \n\ ...\n\n

OpenAI Alfred Workflow

\n\ " if type $pandoc > /dev/null; then echo -n "${meta}\n${results}\n" | pandoc -f markdown -t html5 -s --css "https://yohasebe.github.io/openai-text-completion-workflow/github.css" -o $cache_file echo -n "true" else echo -n "false" fi

require './openai.rb'
params = ARGV[0].split query = params[0]
execute_query(apikey: ENV["apikey"], mode: ENV["mode"], model: ENV["model"], first_language: ENV["first_language"], second_language: ENV["second_language"], max_characters: ENV["max_characters"], max_tokens: ENV["max_tokens"], temperature: ENV["temperature"], top_p: ENV["top_p"], frequency_penalty: ENV["frequency_penalty"], presence_penalty: ENV["presence_penalty"], timeout_sec: ENV["timeout"], echo: ENV["echo"] )
Chech availability of new version of {const:alfred_workflow_name}

require 'open-uri'
github_url = ENV["github_repo"].strip
/(?:https:\/\/)?github\.com\/([^\/]+)\/([^\/]+)\/?/ =~ github_url
exit if !$1 || !$2
app_name = $2
remote_version_file = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/#{$1}/#{$2}/main/version.txt"
begin latest_version = URI.open(remote_version_file).read.strip rescue `osascript <<END display dialog "Github repository for #{app_name} is currently unreacheable. Try sometime later." with title "Update Check Failed" buttons {"OK"} END` exit end
current_version = ENV["alfred_workflow_version"].strip
if latest_version != current_version `osascript <<END display dialog "A new version of #{app_name} (#{latest_version}) is available. Would you like to download the latest version?" with title "New version available" buttons {"Download", "Cancel"} default button 1 if button returned of result is "Download" then open location "#{github_url}" end if END` else `osascript <<END display dialog "#{app_name} (#{current_version}) is currently the newest version available." with title "You are up to date!" buttons {"OK"} END` end
Open input textbox in default browser
Sign up for OpenAI and get your API key: https://openai.com/api/
Set your second language (default: Japanese) This language is used when using GPT-3 for translation
If checked, a notification sound will play when the response is returned
If checked, the response is read alound using Mac's "say" text-to-speach engine. Currently the speaker is set according to the global setting in Mac's System Setting.
If set properly, output is processed as markdown and displayed in the default web browser. Program code is syntax highlighted.
If set, the results will be saved in the specified path as a markdown file
